last_episode_to_air.name: Sex. Clowns. Murder.
last_episode_to_air.overview: In 1990, a clown delivering flowers and balloons guns down a woman at home; with scant evidence and no clear motive, detectives set out to track down the killer clown, but the culprit eludes justice for thirty years before being fully unmasked.

name: People Magazine Investigates

next_episode_to_air.name: The Soccer Mom Murder
next_episode_to_air.overview: In 2001, a mother of five is found shot in the head in her own minivan. Investigators have little physical evidence and struggle to make an arrest. As the children grow up, the family becomes divided over who killed the beloved soccer mom.

overview: Uncover the heart-wrenching true stories behind crimes that transcended headlines and became part of popular culture. Exclusive first hand interviews reveal shocking twists, new evidence, and unexpected resolutions.

episodes.name: The Long Island Serial Killer: The Lost Girls
episodes.overview: When a vivacious young escort, Shannan Gilbert, vanishes on Long Island's south shore in 2010, her disappearance leads police to discover the bodies of ten other victims dumped by a serial killer.

episodes.name: The Long Island Serial Killer: New Revelations
episodes.overview: The discovery of four women's bodies on Gilgo Beach was just the beginning. But who is the Long Island Serial Killer? Investigators uncover multiple suspects and shocking theories, as they race to capture this prolific killer before he strikes again.

episodes.name: What Happened to Baby Lisa?
episodes.overview: [Gone Without a Trace]  In 2011, a 10-month-old baby girl goes missing from her home in Kansas City. The family fears she's been kidnapped by a drifter, only to be accused by the police of being responsible for her disappearance.

episodes.name: Stranger Than Fiction
episodes.overview: [Murder by the Book]  On June 12, 1991, outgoing Jackie Galloway is found strangled and bound with ritualistic knots. Police investigate suspects in her inner circle but are shocked when a chance encounter with a prowler leads them to discover the murderer is a budding serial killer.

episodes.name: Cabin 28: Horror in the Woods
episodes.overview: [The Keddie Murders]  A mother and three teens are murdered in the remote town of Keddie, California. Despite a trail of suspects and illicit activity, no one was ever brought to justice. But recently discovered evidence may be the key to finally cracking case.

episodes.name: Hollywood Horror Story
episodes.overview: [A Ghastly Discovery]  In 2012, hikers in Los Angeles' Hollywood Hills discover the severed head of Hervey Medellin, a retired flight clerk. The cast of suspects includes former lovers, drug cartels and a murderous porn star, in a tale of lust, greed and butchery.

episodes.name: In the Name of Love
episodes.overview: [Mystery in Texas]  In 1995, 16-year-old Adrianne Jones is found shot to death in Grand Prairie, Texas. A model student and athlete, there seems to be no reason for her death. Police investigate boyfriends, neighbors and local troublemakers, but don't have any strong suspects. The case grows cold, until nine months later when a game of Truth-or-Dare leads to a startling confession and an over-achieving relationship that went murderously awry.

episodes.name: JonBenét: The Untold Truth
episodes.overview: [20-Year Murder Mystery]  Six-year-old beauty queen JonBenét Ramsey is found murdered in her Boulder, Colorado home in 1996. Investigators try to unravel if she was killed in a kidnapping-gone-wrong, by a home intruder or by one of her own family.

episodes.name: The Grim Sleeper
episodes.overview: [Los Angeles Serial Killer]  A lone survivor is the only witness who can help police track down a serial killer known as the Grim Sleeper, who preys on women in South Central Los Angeles. After decades of searching, police hone in on an unlikely suspect.

episodes.name: The Darkest of Nights
episodes.overview: [Murder in Alaska]  In 2004, the small town of Craig, Alaska is shocked when police discover the charred body of beloved mother and wife Lauri Waterman. People have no idea who would want to kill her, until an unlikely witness reveals a sordid story of secrets and lies.

episodes.name: Jeffrey MacDonald: The Accused
episodes.overview: An army surgeon, Jeffrey MacDonald, is the lone survivor of a brutal 1970 home invasion that claims the lives of his wife and daughters. But authorities doubt his story of murderous hippies and believe MacDonald is the culprit.

episodes.name: The Golden State Killer Caught
episodes.overview: [The Hunt for the Original Night Stalker]  In the 1970s a serial rapist is on the loose in northern California; then, as his reign of terror over the community wanes, police discover he isn't just a serial rapist, he's a serial murderer and he's been killing people all over California.

episodes.name: Where Is Baby DeOrr?
episodes.overview: [Every Parent's Worst Nightmare]  A young couple's toddler vanishes while the family is enjoying an impromptu camping trip in Leadore, Idaho; investigators and private detectives work around the clock to find the missing boy, only to come back to his parents.

episodes.name: Shallow Grave
episodes.overview: [What Happened to the McStays?]  When a young family vanishes from their Southern California dream home, friends and family are left with dozens of unanswered questions; authorities suspect they fled the country, until an unlikely source uncovers the truth.

episodes.name: Connecticut Horror Story
episodes.overview: [The Petit Family Tragedy]  One summer night in 2007, the Petit family is woken up by two strangers in their quiet Connecticut home; suddenly, these four family members find themselves being held hostage and in a fight for their lives.

guest_stars.character: Self - True Crime Author, "Murder in Connecticut"
guest_stars.name: Michael Benson

episodes.name: Once Bitten
episodes.overview: [A Nurse's Mysterious Murder]  Sherri Rasmussen and John Ruetten are enjoying newlywed life until one morning when Sherri calls into work sick; that night, John returns home to find his wife murdered; years later, detectives discover Sherri's killer was too close for comfort.

episodes.name: Murder at Sea
episodes.overview: [Who Killed the Coulthurst Family?]  A premiere fishing boat explodes into flames just off shore, stunning the small fishing town of Craig, Alaska; after fighting the flames, state troopers discover the remains of a young family and few clues as to could have set the ship blaze.

episodes.name: Marked for Murder
episodes.overview: [Justice for Dan Markel]  In Florida, friends and family are stunned after an esteemed criminal law professor is executed in his garage; investigators follow a series of leads taking them on a statewide hunt in search of the murderous masterminds.

episodes.name: Killing Field
episodes.overview: [South Carolina Body Count]  After a young couple goes missing, detectives find a clue leading them to a strange storage container in the middle of 95 acres, and what's inside unlocks the secrets of a monster hiding in plain sight.

episodes.name: Blood In the Sand
episodes.overview: [Teenage Murder]  In 1984, the body of a 14-year-old girl turns up on the beach in San Diego and police think it relates to the murder of another teen; a clue yields an unbelievable suspect.

episodes.name: My Father, the Serial Killer
episodes.overview: [Who is Edward Wayne Edwards?]  In 1980, Tim Hack and Kelly Drew go missing from a small Wisconsin town, then their bodies are found in a field; a woman comes forward nearly 40 years later to help solve the so-called "Sweetheart Murders" of Hack and Drew.

episodes.name: Alaskan Temptress
episodes.overview: [Grieving Fianceé or Cold-Blooded Killer]  Shock sweeps through a Washington community when a suburban mother gets arrested for a murder from a decade earlier in Alaska; details of a seedy and sordid past emerge.

guest_stars.character: Self - True Crime Author, "Dead Man's Dancer"
guest_stars.name: Tom Brennan

episodes.name: Death Before Dawn
episodes.overview: [A Family Shattered]  Police investigate the shooting deaths of millionaires Brad and Andra Sachs in their home in 2014 and track a series of clues in a chase to find the couple's killer.

episodes.name: Somebody's Watching
episodes.overview: [Blaze on the Bayou]  After a fire chief's wife's burned body is discovered, an autopsy reveals she died from a gunshot wound to the head, and the arson investigation turns into a hunt for her killer.

episodes.name: Terror in Philadelphia
episodes.overview: [Who Murdered Shannon Schieber?]  In 1998, a gifted Philadelphia graduate student is found murdered in her bed, triggering a hunt for her killer.

episodes.name: Gone in 90 Seconds
episodes.overview: [A Parent's Worst Nightmare]  When an 11-year-old Arizona girl vanishes while waiting for an ice cream truck, it's clear she's been abducted; the search for her leads to a trail of suspects, making it the largest missing child investigation in Arizona history.

episodes.name: Fallen Angels
episodes.overview: [Where Are Our Girls?]  A 12-year-old girl goes missing on her way to school in Oregon City, Ore.; the police investigation offers little in the way of leads, then a second girl disappears.

episodes.name: Mystery in the Swamp
episodes.overview: [Darkness Exposed]  The morning of his anniversary, Mike Williams goes duck hunting. When he fails to return home that afternoon, an all-out search commences. But it's only the beginning of a sordid mystery that will take close to 20 years to solve.

episodes.name: Murder Among Friends
episodes.overview: [Justice for Joyce]  In the summer of 1980, a popular teen goes for a run around her hometown in Maine and vanishes. Days later, her savagely beaten body is found. But what happened remains a mystery for years, until her mother intervenes and forces police to reexamine the case

episodes.name: Gone Girls
episodes.overview: [Serial Killer from Mississippi]  When three women from three different decades meet their death or go missing under mysterious circumstances, authorities are forced to examine the one thing they had in common: they all fell in love with the same man.

episodes.name: Fatal Family Secrets
episodes.overview: [Who Murdered the Whitakers?]  A celebratory night turns deadly for a Texas family when they are gunned down at home. When investigators uncover a conspiracy, it will test one man's ability to forgive as he fights to save the criminal mastermind from the death penalty.

episodes.name: Murder on Newberry Street
episodes.overview: [A City's Dark Past]  In York, PA, 1969, race riots claim the lives of an African-American mother and a young, white police officer; their deaths are largely forgotten until 30 years later when their cold cases are reopened, revealing the city's dark past.

episodes.name: The Unicorn Killer
episodes.overview: [Where is Holly Maddux?]  In Philadelphia, police make a horrific discovery 18 months after a woman goes missing; the police pursue the woman's killer, but he always manages to stay one step ahead of the law.

episodes.name: Children of Thunder
episodes.overview: [Secret Cult of Terror]  In the summer of 2000, bags full of body parts start appearing all over the San Francisco Bay Area; investigators follow the trail of grisly clues to a secret cult carrying out a sinister scheme.

episodes.name: Monster in the Desert
episodes.overview: [Surviving a Serial Killer]  In 1992, a 19-year-old woman is brutally assaulted outside of Desert Hot Springs, CA; miraculously, she escapes but lives in constant fear that her assailant will find her again one day, not realizing she has survived a serial killer.

episodes.name: The Sound of Silence
episodes.overview: [The DC Dorm Slayings]  Gallaudet University is the premier college for the deaf in the United States, but this haven of higher learning is turned upside down after two students are murdered in their dormitory rooms.

episodes.name: Burned Alive
episodes.overview: [Who Killed Jessica Chambers?]  On a Mississippi back road, a 19-year-old woman is set on fire and left to burn alive; her last words lead detectives down a road of dead ends and the case goes cold until a special agent taps into her location data and finds a suspect.

episodes.name: Who Killed Jane Doe 59?
episodes.overview: [Another Manson Murder?]  In 1969, a woman is found murdered in Los Angeles, but her identity is a mystery; for decades, police investigate hoping to put a name to the face and find her killer; the one lead that comes up over and over leads them to Charles Manson.

guest_stars.character: Self - True Crime Co-Author, 'Hunting Charles Manson'
guest_stars.name: Caitlin Rother

episodes.name: The Springfield Three
episodes.overview: On June 6, 1992, Suzie Streeter and Stacy McCall are out celebrating high school graduation. By morning, the teens are missing, along with Suzie's mother. The case leads police on a nationwide search as they work to solve this baffling mystery.

episodes.name: Vanished
episodes.overview: So-Cal surfer and tech entrepreneur, Chris Smith, dreams of making a tidy sum of money and then surfing off into the sunset. It seems his dreams have come true, but all is not as it appears.

episodes.name: Without a Trace
episodes.overview: In 1984, 10-year-old Kevin Collins disappears on his way home and the city of San Francisco is galvanized in an effort to find him. With few leads to go on, his case sheds light on hundreds of other kids who have vanished without a trace in the U.S.

episodes.name: The Freeway Phantom
episodes.overview: In 1971 and '72, Washington DC is terrorized by a cunning killer who abducts and murders six young African American girls. Police and the community are outraged by the serial killings that target young children in their own neighborhoods.

episodes.name: A Killing In Chinatown
episodes.overview: Art imitates life when Cambodian genocide survivor Dr. Haing Ngor wins an Oscar for his role in the film The Killing Fields. But when he's gunned down the LAPD investigate a web of political intrigue, revenge and street gangs to uncover the truth.

episodes.name: Memphis Blues
episodes.overview: In July of 2010, NBA star and family man Lorenzen Wright goes missing outside of Memphis, TN.  When his dead body is discovered in the woods, investigators find that this case is far from a slam dunk.

episodes.name: Law & Murder
episodes.overview: A double murder involving the family of a federal judge will lead the FBI, US Marshals and Chicago PD on an investigation of epic proportions. But when law enforcement finds the end of the trail, they learn the death count may climb higher.

episodes.name: Nine Years in the Shadows
episodes.overview: In 1988, a young woman is found murdered in her Modesto, Calif., home, leading police to investigate the strife and infidelity in her marriage. A surprising witness eventually comes forward.

episodes.name: The Cheerleader and The Hitman
episodes.overview: When a widower and father of three is found murdered outside his Long Island home, police have reason to look into shady business dealings as a possible motive. Then, a tip leads to three unlikely suspects, exposing dark family secrets.

episodes.name: Oklahoma Horror Story
episodes.overview: Right before Thanksgiving, two masked gunmen reportedly invade a couple's home and kill the husband; with few leads, police use ballistics, forensics and neighborhood gossip to solve this cold-blooded murder.

episodes.name: Suburban Secrets
episodes.overview: After doting mother Cheryl Coker vanishes from Riverside, Ohio, numerous searches turn up nothing; as police take a closer look at the case, they uncover some disturbing information.

episodes.name: Motor City Murder
episodes.overview: A senseless murder rocks an African-American neighborhood in 1970s Detroit; police arrest suspects who are ultimately convicted of murder, but 47 years later, the truth finally emerges to right history's wrongs.

episodes.name: Highway of Horrors
episodes.overview: College student Tammy Zywicki vanishes in 1992 after her car breaks down on the highway. Family and friends scramble to find her, but when her body is found 500 miles from where she vanished there are very few clues pointing to her killer. Police struggle with dead-end leads and suspects who don't pan out. New DNA technology promises to finally crack the case decades later. As her family clings to the last of their hope, the fear is that it may be too little too late for justice.

episodes.name: Jenner Beach Murders
episodes.overview: In the summer of 2004, Lindsay Cutshall and Jason Allen are working as councilors at an outdoor Christian adventure camp in Northern California They decide to head down the coast for a weekend getaway, but when they fail to return to camp Sunday evening, the camp staff become very concerned. A search ensues and the police discover the couples' bodies at Fish Head Beach, in Jenner, California. As police begin investigating the double homicide, they discover the killer has left no clues and little evidence. Over the succeeding days, weeks, and years, Sonoma County Detectives investigate a group of suspects as they relentlessly search for the killer.

episodes.name: Flight Risk
episodes.overview: Kelsey Berreth, a young mother, and pilot was last heard from on the morning of Thanksgiving 2018. Her fiancé is worried she may have harmed herself after a stressful year. But when police discover blood in an unusual place, they begin to unravel a bizarre story of love, jealousy, and a murder that goes far beyond what anyone in law enforcement could have imagined.

episodes.name: The Delphi Killer
episodes.overview: A quiet rural town is rocked when two middle-school girls go on a hike and are later found murdered. But when police discover one of the girls may have recorded her killer with her cellphone, the race is on to find the mysterious man.

episodes.name: Blood Ties
episodes.overview: On a snowy night in January 1980, college student Helene Pruszynski disappears after reaching her final bus stop. When her body turns up in a snowy field, police launch a long and frustrating investigation that pushes family and detectives to the brink of hopelessness. Their hope is revived when they discover that cutting-edge forensic genealogy may hold the key to finding Helene's murderer.

episodes.name: The Hollywood Ripper
episodes.overview: When Ashley Ellerin is found murdered in her Hollywood bungalow, police zero in on the Hollywood heartthrob she was supposed to have a date with the night she was killed. The case takes a shocking turn as detectives realize Ashley is not the only victim, and discover they are on the hunt for a serial killer. The assailant's victim count grows until one woman manages to fight back so fiercely that he leaves behind critical blood evidence. But will they be able to finally catch him?

episodes.name: Little Girl Gone
episodes.overview: In the summer of 2003, the Iron Range of northern Minnesota is a peaceful community where parents let their kids play outside on their own without a second thought. But when five-year-old LeeAnna Warner vanishes without a trace, investigators do a deep dive into the quaint community and realize that some of the familiar faces in the neighborhood may be hiding some disturbing secrets that may never fully be uncovered.

episodes.name: The Price of Fame
episodes.overview: In the spring of 2001, former child actor and Baretta star Robert Blake just married Bonny Lee Bakely, the mother of his new baby girl. The couple are out to dinner in Los Angeles when Bakely is murdered in the passenger seat of the couple's car, execution style. Blake seems devastated, but as police investigate, they uncover a tale of a troubled marriage of convenience and a fight for custody that may have led to one of Hollywood's most infamous murders.

episodes.name: A Crimson End
episodes.overview: When a woman is found dead in her historic house on Horseshoe Lake, police chase her killer to the water where he drowns. But when the body is recovered, people are shocked to realize this story started 25 years earlier when two other family members were found murdered by the same man.

episodes.name: Is Rodney Reed Innocent?
episodes.overview: 19-year-old Stacey Stites is found raped and murdered in a small Texas town. After a year-long investigation police match DNA from the scene to a man named Rodney Reed. Reed is convicted and sentenced to death, but in the coming years as Reed proclaims his innocence, certain evidence comes to light that might prove he's telling the truth.

episodes.name: Red Christmas
episodes.overview: [Quiet Night, Deadly Night]  On December 10, 2003, police respond to a mysterious 911 call at a home in the Walnut Estates in Mansfield, Texas. When authorities enter the home they discover the bloodied bodies of homeowners Rick and Suzy Wamsley. The key to finding the killer is within one of the victim's grasp.

episodes.name: Bible Belt Massacre
episodes.overview: Two days before the new millennium, the Freeman family trailer is burned to the ground. The couple's remains are found with bullets to the head, but their teenage daughter and her friend are missing.

episodes.name: Groene Family Massacre
episodes.overview: A savage killer goes on a homicidal rampage and then abducts two young siblings from their home in the middle of the night. The children quickly decide they will do whatever is necessary to survive.

episodes.name: Mother's Orders
episodes.overview: A mother's bond to her daughter is put to the ultimate test when one of them shoots a man dead.

episodes.name: Alibi
episodes.overview: During an armed robbery, a father of three is fatally shot, but for 23 years, another family questions if the wrong man is behind bars.

episodes.name: Valley of Death
episodes.overview: Five young people disappeared over a span of four years in the rural area of  Lewis-Clark Valley, along the Idaho-Washington border. Investigators search for links to the mysterious cases.

episodes.name: The Colorado Hammer
episodes.overview: In 1984, a slew of brutal hammer attacks leaves a Colorado community in fear. It takes nearly 40 years before a serial killer is brought to justice.

episodes.name: Evil Comes to Jasper
episodes.overview: The murder of James Byrd, Jr. throws his family into turmoil as law enforcement investigates one of the most gruesome hate crimes in U.S. history.

episodes.name: American Nightmare
episodes.overview: One family's American dream goes up in flames. As they try to rebuild what's left, they vow never to extinguish their search for justice.

episodes.name: The Grudge
episodes.overview: In 2020, a Mennonite woman goes missing from her small religious community. They find her body, but forensic evidence leads them to a dead end, stymieing law enforcement. Detectives get creative in an effort to find their suspect.

episodes.name: Gone in the Night
episodes.overview: When a young woman goes missing, a rookie police officer's intuition leads to an intense investigation, as they race against the clock to find her.

episodes.name: Darkness in the Desert
episodes.overview: A 19-year-old coed leaves her apartment and never returns. When her body is found in a desert river basin, police and internet sleuths alike wonder if she was a victim of an alleged killer known as The Zombie Hunter.

episodes.name: Natural Born Killers
episodes.overview: In May 2002, a couple goes missing in Ocean City, Maryland. It's almost as if they vanished into thin air until a random, late-night burglary leads police to discover a tale of deception, brutality and savagery, the likes of which they have never seen.

episodes.name: Infamous Pam Hupp
episodes.overview: In 2011, a husband returns home to find his wife dead on the living room floor. He tells first responders she committed suicide, but it was murder. Police zero in on the husband and what unfolds is one of the most outrageous tales in recent history.

episodes.name: Candy and Betty
episodes.overview: When neighbors find a young teacher axed to death on Friday the 13th, a sleepy suburb fears a psychopath is loose; the bloody crime scene leads police to a most unlikely suspect, unfolding a story people still have to see to believe 40 years later.

episodes.name: Girl Scout Murders
episodes.overview: The 1977 brutal assault and murder of three Oklahoma Girl Scouts away at summer camp: Lori Lee Farmer, Doris Denise Milner, and Michele Heather Guse is discussed.

episodes.name: The I-70 Killer
episodes.overview: An unknown shooter unleashes carnage from Indianapolis to Wichita, Kansas, killing six in the spring of 1992 at various retail stores near 1-70, a major east-west highway that runs through the very heart of the Midwest. A sketch of the suspect is developed from various eyewitness accounts, but police are at a loss ... until one victim survives.

episodes.name: Where is Mark Himebaugh?
episodes.overview: In 1991, a young boy leaves home to check out a local brush fire that was capturing his neighborhood's attention and never returns home. Decades have passed and police continue to look for his abductor(s), while his mother is still waiting for him to find his way home.

episodes.name: Final Rodeo
episodes.overview: A 16-year-old cowgirl goes missing in Nevada. Three days later her body was found draped under a blue tarp that had been dumped among the tumbleweeds. As police search for her killer, the investigation takes a sudden turn towards the boy she called "brother."

episodes.name: The Strange Disappearance of Karlie Gusé
episodes.overview: In 2018, a 16-year-old girl vanishes into thin air the morning after attending a high school party in an isolated California mountain town. The bizarre mystery leads to speculation by internet sleuths that her parents are somehow involved due to inconsistencies in their story.

episodes.name: Brighton Ax Murder
episodes.overview: In 1982, in an upscale suburb of Rochester, New York, a Kodak executive returns home and finds his wife dead with an ax in her head. People believed a madman was on the loose, so 40 years later when police make an arrest, everyone is stunned at who stands trial for the murder.

episodes.name: Who Killed Our Girls?
episodes.overview: Four teenage girls are brutally murdered in a yogurt shop in North Austin, Texas, in 1991, in what becomes the biggest mass murder in Austin history. The investigation that follows drags on for years, and even when police make an arrest, justice is not guaranteed.

episodes.name: Held Captive
episodes.overview: A 14-year-old girl finds herself lost and unloved following her parents' divorce and a move to a new town, providing a perfect opportunity for someone to lure her away. For 10 years she's held captive, until she makes her escape.

episodes.name: Dead in Bed
episodes.overview: When a 19-year-old girl is found murdered in her boyfriend's bed in a small Texas town, everyone is a suspect. The case goes cold until a new sheriff comes to town who sheds fresh light on some old evidence, but will it be enough to bring her killer to justice?

episodes.name: Star Crossed Killers
episodes.overview: When a single mom tells her 14-year-old daughter to break off a relationship with a 19-year-old man, the young lovers murder the girl's mom, setting off a manhunt and culminating in a trial replete with finger-pointing and betrayal.

episodes.name: The Times Square Killer
episodes.overview: In the '60s and '70s, a serial killer stalks young women in New Jersey; at the same time, three women in New York City are sadistically murdered; no one expects that one man is causing the mayhem, let alone a seemingly ordinary father of three.

episodes.name: Manhunt
episodes.overview: In 2003, a bank heist escalates into a robbery-homicide, shattering the lives of those left behind; federal and local law enforcement have his picture and DNA, but they can't find the cold-blooded killer until they learn he hides in plain sight.

episodes.name: Long Island Serial Killer: Mystery at Oak Beach
episodes.overview: A terrified young escort calls 911 as she flees into the night and vanishes; her family pressures police to take up the search, and investigators uncover a strange cast of characters - plus 10 other bodies spread along a remote stretch of beach.

episodes.name: Long Island Serial Killer: Caught
episodes.overview: When police discover 10 bodies strewn along a remote beach, there are few answers and even fewer suspects; over a decade later, a new investigation uncovers old leads, and police finally think they've found their man.

episodes.name: The Boogeyman
episodes.overview: The Lunsford family's lives turn upside down when someone snatches Jessie from her bed.

episodes.name: A Story to Die For
episodes.overview: Virginia firefighters respond to a house fire in Upperville, Virginia where they discover the body of a local journalist. The fire destroys any hope for evidence, but the victim's social media history leads police down a rabbit hole.

episodes.name: Sex. Clowns. Murder.
episodes.overview: In 1990, a clown delivering flowers and balloons guns down a woman at home; with scant evidence and no clear motive, detectives set out to track down the killer clown, but the culprit eludes justice for thirty years before being fully unmasked.

episodes.name: The Soccer Mom Murder
episodes.overview: In 2001, a mother of five is found shot in the head in her own minivan. Investigators have little physical evidence and struggle to make an arrest. As the children grow up, the family becomes divided over who killed the beloved soccer mom.
